verses.name: Job 38:1
verses.text: Then the Lord answered Job out of the whirlwind, and said,

verses.name: Job 38:2
verses.text: Who is this that darkeneth counsel by words without knowledge?

verses.name: Job 38:3
verses.text: Gird up now thy loins like a man; for I will demand of thee, and answer thou me.

verses.name: Job 38:4
verses.text: Where wast thou when I laid the foundations of the earth? declare, if thou hast understanding.

verses.name: Job 38:5
verses.text: Who hath laid the measures thereof, if thou knowest? or who hath stretched the line upon it?

verses.name: Job 38:6
verses.text: Whereupon are the foundations thereof fastened? or who laid the corner stone thereof;

verses.name: Job 38:7
verses.text: When the morning stars sang together, and all the sons of God shouted for joy?
